generated_text:
"Module 20: NLP" 
Discover Natural Language Processing (NLP) tools. Learn to analyze and generate human language, improving communication and automation. Apply NLP to text and speech, enhancing workflow efficiency.

mcqs.question: What is the primary goal of NLP?
options: To analyze and generate human language

flashcards.back: The process of extracting meaningful information from text data
The ability of a machine to identify and translate spoken language into text
